testcase.classname: Composing the text and sharing the message to your friends and followers Using Multiple Elements
testcase.name: Using Composer, TextTool, Sticker, Video_1
testcase.system-out: Given I go to Yubl app on "iPhone 6"........................................passed And Check I am on "homePage" with "yublPrivate".............................passed And I click on "Menu".......................................................passed When I tap on "Profile" with name...........................................passed And I get the value of "profilebeforefeeds".................................passed And I tap on "profileBackButton" with name..................................passed When I tap on "Public" with name............................................passed And I click on "composer"...................................................passed
